00020 #include "rbool.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RPrimitive {
00023     
00024     RDK2_FACTORY(RBool);
00025     
00026     static const char * d = "RBool";
00027     const char * RBool::myClassName() const {
00028         return d;
00029     }
00030     
00031     
00032     void RBool::read(RDK2::Serialization::Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00033         r->startReading(getClassName());
00034             value = r->read_i8();
00035         r->doneReading();
00036     }
00037 
00038     void RBool::write(RDK2::Serialization::Writer*w) const throw (WritingException)  {
00039         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00040             w->write_i8(value?1:0);
00041         w->doneWriting();
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     std::string RBool::getStringRepresentation() const {
00046         return value ? "Yes" : "No"; 
00047     }
00048     
00049     bool RBool::loadFromStringRepresentation(const std::string& s) {
00050         if (s == "1" || s == "Yes" || s == "yes" || s == "True" || s == "true") {
00051             value = true;
00052             return true;
00053         }
00054         else if (s == "0" || s == "No" || s == "no" || s == "False" || s == "false") {
00055             value = false;
00056             return true;
00057         }
00058         else return false;
00059     }
